feed.title: Hermosawave Photography
feed.subtitle: A series of daily landscape photographs by Daniel Sofer, over 16 years running.

entry.title: Good Stuff on the Strand
entry.content: Looking down the Strand north of the Pier. Some cosmetic and ownership changes since this 2012 photo, but these places are still here; not yet sacrificed for the luxury hotel planned for this site.
entry.summary: Looking down the Strand north of the Pier. Some cosmetic and ownership changes since this 2012 photo, but these places are still here; not yet sacrificed for the luxury hotel planned for this site.

entry.title: Hermosa Beach Volleyball
entry.content: A shot from the AAU Junior Beach Tournament going on today north of the Hermosa Beach Pier.
entry.summary: A shot from the AAU Junior Beach Tournament going on today north of the Hermosa Beach Pier.

entry.title: New York Bay at Sunset
entry.content: Schooner sails past Governor’s Island and the southern tip of Manhattan, this evening from Valentino Pier in Red Hook.
entry.summary: Schooner sails past Governor’s Island and the southern tip of Manhattan, this evening from Valentino Pier in Red Hook.

entry.title: Afternoon in Central Park
entry.content: Looking across the Jackie Onassis Reservoir at apartments facing the Upper West Side of Central Park, including the twin tower Eldorado.
entry.summary: Looking across the Jackie Onassis Reservoir at apartments facing the Upper West Side of Central Park, including the twin tower Eldorado.

entry.title: TWA Hotel
entry.content: The recently opened hotel in the former TWA terminal at New York’s Kennedy Airport. Designed by Eero Saarinen, it's aways been a favorite of mine. Glad to see it open again.
entry.summary: The recently opened hotel in the former TWA terminal at New York’s Kennedy Airport. Designed by Eero Saarinen, it's aways been a favorite of mine. Glad to see it open again.

entry.title: Stone Sunset
entry.content:
Sun sets behind stacked stones, at Rat Beach Palos Verdes.

This is the southern most point of Santa Monica Bay; in the distance is Malibu, the northern most point.
entry.summary: Sun sets behind stacked stones, at Rat Beach Palos Verdes. This is the southern most point of Santa Monica Bay; in the distance is Malibu, the northern most point.

entry.title: Clouds at the Coast
entry.content: Heavy layer of clouds, today at 22nd St. in Hermosa Beach.
entry.summary: Heavy layer of clouds, today at 22nd St. in Hermosa Beach.

entry.title: Malaga Coast
entry.content: Cruising above Malaga Cove and Rat Beach in Palos Verdes Estates.
entry.summary: Cruising above Malaga Cove and Rat Beach in Palos Verdes Estates.

entry.title: Punk and Skate
entry.content: Celebrating Hermosa Beach's heritage of Punk and Skateboarding is this mural by Daniel Inez, on the side of the 13th St. parking structure.
entry.summary: Celebrating Hermosa Beach's heritage of Punk and Skateboarding is this mural by Daniel Inez, on the side of the 13th St. parking structure.

entry.title: Sunset at Flat Rock
entry.content: Looking out into the Pacific Ocean from above Bluff Cove in Palos Verdes.
entry.summary: Looking out into the Pacific Ocean from above Bluff Cove in Palos Verdes.
